page.title: 16AN ADULT'S DAY AT HOME
page.content: My name is John. I am 34 years old. I get up in the morning at 7.00 am. I have a wash, a shave and get dressed and go downstairs at about 7.20 am. I put on the kettle in the kitchen to make a pot of tea and then I take the dog out for her morning walk. I return at about 7.45 am. and eat breakfast, usually cereal, which my wife has prepared. At 8.00 am. I leave home to drive to work. I return home from work at about 5.00 pm. and wash and change in time for dinner which is usually at about 6.00 pm. After dinner I usually read the paper for an hour and then do any work which is necessary. This might be gardening or work connected with my job. Later in the evening I might go out with my wife to the local public house or I might stay at home and watch the television.
